post.description:
Generate QR Code with customizable options

Parameters:
- text: Text or URL to encode in QR code
- format: Output format (png, jpg, svg, pdf)
- size: QR code size in pixels (50-2000)
- border: Border size in modules (0-20)
- error_correction: Error correction level (L, M, Q, H)
- fill_color: QR code color (CSS color name or hex)
- back_color: Background color (CSS color name or hex)
- style: QR code style (square, rounded, circle)

get.description: Get information about QR code generation capabilities

post.description: Validate QR code text without generating the code

Compress an image with customizable options

Parameters:
- file: Image file to compress (max 200MB)
- quality: Compression quality (10-100 for JPEG/WebP, 1-9 for PNG)
- format: Output format (jpeg, png, webp)
- width: Target width in pixels (optional)
- height: Target height in pixels (optional)
- maintain_aspect_ratio: Whether to maintain aspect ratio when resizing
- optimize: Enable optimization for smaller file size
- progressive: Enable progressive encoding (JPEG only)

get.description: Get information about image compression capabilities

post.description:
Estimate compressed file size without actually compressing
Useful for preview before actual compression

Extract text from image using OCR

Parameters:
- file: Image file to process (max 50MB)
- language: Language code (eng, spa, fra, deu, etc.)
- engine: OCR engine (tesseract, easyocr, paddleocr)
- enhance_image: Apply image enhancement preprocessing
- auto_rotate: Automatically detect and correct orientation
- output_format: Output format (text, json, hocr)

get.description: Get OCR system capabilities and supported features
Get list of supported languages for OCR

post.description: Validate image for OCR processing and provide recommendations

Convert font files between different formats

Supported input formats: TTF, OTF, WOFF, WOFF2, EOT, SVG, PS Type 1
Supported output formats: TTF, OTF, WOFF, WOFF2

get.description: Get font conversion status
Get supported font formats

post.description:
Compress PDF files with advanced compression techniques

Compression Levels:
- low: Minimal compression, highest quality (10-30% reduction)
- medium: Balanced compression and quality (30-60% reduction)
- high: Maximum compression, good quality (50-80% reduction)

Features:
- Advanced image optimization
- Metadata removal
- Font compression
- Content stream compression

get.description: Get PDF compression status
Get PDF compression capabilities and information

post.description:
Add password protection to PDF files

Encryption Levels:
- basic: 40-bit RC4 encryption (basic security)
- standard: 128-bit RC4/AES encryption (recommended)
- high: 256-bit AES encryption (maximum security)

Available Permissions:
- print: Allow printing
- modify: Allow modifying content
- copy: Allow copying text/graphics
- annotations: Allow adding annotations
- forms: Allow filling forms
- extract: Allow text extraction
- assemble: Allow document assembly
- print_high: Allow high-quality printing

Remove password protection from PDF files

This endpoint removes password protection from encrypted PDF files,
allowing unrestricted access to the document content.

get.description: Get PDF protection/unprotection status

post.description:
Check if PDF file is password protected

This endpoint analyzes a PDF file to determine if it requires
a password to open and provides encryption information.

get.description: Get PDF password protection capabilities and information

post.description:
Split PDF file based on the specified option

- split_option: "all" (individual pages), "range" (custom ranges), "individual" (same as all)
- page_range: For range option, e.g., "1-3, 5, 7-10"

get.description: Get supported PDF split options
Get information about the DeFi yield calculator
Get information about the JWT decoder

post.description:
Generate a professional video script using AI

**Parameters:**
- topic: What the video is about
- duration: How long the video should be (1-60 minutes)
- tone: The style/mood of the script
- platform: Where the video will be published

**Returns:**
- Complete video script with timestamps
- Visual and music cues
- Thumbnail suggestions
- SEO keywords
- Metadata

Refine or modify an existing video script

**Parameters:**
- original_script: The script to refine
- refinement_request: Specific changes to make

**Returns:**
- Refined script with requested modifications

get.description:
Get available options for script generation

**Returns:**
- Available tones
- Available platforms
- Duration recommendations
- Tips for best results
Check if the AI Image Generator service is running

post.description: Generate images from text descriptions using AI

schema.title: Response List All Urls Api Url List Get

post.description:
Remove background from image

Args:
    file: Image file to process
    output_format: Output format (png, jpg, webp)
    background_color: Background color in format 'r,g,b,a' (e.g., '255,255,255,255')
    edge_refinement: Edge refinement level 0-10
    quality: Output quality 1-100

Returns:
    Processed image file

Blur background while keeping foreground sharp

Args:
    file: Image file to process
    blur_intensity: Blur intensity 1-100
    output_format: Output format (png, jpg, webp)

Returns:
    Processed image file

Replace background with custom image

Args:
    foreground: Foreground image file
    background: Background image file
    output_format: Output format (png, jpg, webp)

Returns:
    Processed image file

Add gradient background to image

Args:
    file: Image file to process
    gradient_type: Gradient type (linear or radial)
    color_start: Start color in RGB format 'r,g,b'
    color_end: End color in RGB format 'r,g,b'
    output_format: Output format (png, jpg, webp)

Returns:
    Processed image file

Batch process multiple images

Args:
    files: List of image files to process
    output_format: Output format (png, jpg, webp)
    background_color: Background color in format 'r,g,b,a'

Returns:
    ZIP file with all processed images

Resize processed image

Args:
    file: Image file to resize
    size: Size preset (small, medium, original)

Returns:
    Resized image file
